attributes.action: Work experience to be funded by the governement
attributes.additional_details: Work experience in high schools is now at a minimum, mainly for the fact that, the governemnet pulled the funding. It is now upto individual schools to fund this, with the average bill of £5,000 Work experience for the younger generation, to realise what they will do when theyre older, and to improve behaviour and understanding of working life.  It seems the government are been quite careless with the younger generation, involving tuition fees and funding.
